title: Vintage Rose-Cut Diamond Chakri Pendant - Chakri Bottu
materials: meticulously adorned with Rose-Cut Diamonds. Features traditional Hyderabadi setting techniques.
features: A circular pendant featuring a floral motif at its center. It showcases the timeless beauty of rose-cut diamonds set in a symmetrical pattern. The outer ring is lined with smaller diamonds and each main petal like diamond is surrounded with smaller diamonds highlighting the beauty of the diamond shape.
colors: Predominantly gold and white diamond. The rose-cut diamonds exhibit a subtle sparkle
which contrasts beautifully with the warm tone of the 22K gold.
occasions: Perfect for traditional occasions like weddings (pellilu)
and family gatherings. Its vintage charm also makes it a unique statement piece for contemporary events.
description: This Chakri Bottu pendant is a testament to timeless South Indian craftsmanship. The use of rose-cut diamonds, an antique cutting style, offers a unique alternative to modern brilliant cuts, enhancing its vintage appeal. The 22K gold provides both richness and durability, ensuring the pendant will be cherished for generations.
